Quickstrike:




Quickstrike stumbled getting to his feet. He saw the shot from Shredder only 
seconds, so that meant responding only seconds. He scurried to the side, and 
lost his balance. He slammed into the wall at his left, falling on his rear. 
He extended his left arm and fired back at Shredder. He rolled to his knees 
afterwards.
